rooms.description: Spacious living area with Vastu aligned north-east direction to promote positivity.
Larger bedroom with attached bathroom and closet on the west side for privacy.
Cozy guest room placed on the east side to balance energy flow.
Well-organized kitchen adjoining dining area with north-east direction for auspicious cooking space.
Sleek dining area adjacent to the kitchen and living room.
General bathroom for convenience located centrally accessible.
Storage area integrated in the corridor to reduce clutter, placed near entrance.

openings.description: A welcoming main entrance with Vastu compliant door placement and a decorative archway.
Pathways leading to the central courtyard, enhancing natural light and ventilation.
Service entrance for utilities with Vastu alignment ensuring smooth energy flow.

courtyard.description: A central open space acting as the heart of the farmhouse, designed according to Vastu principles to foster harmony and balance in the home environment.
